availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Jane Montgomery Miller in 1835. Father of John A Miller, Sarah Miller, Martha Miller, Isaac N. Miller, William B. Miller, Letecia A. Miller, Thomas M. Miller, David P. Miller, James B. Miller, Alonzo Miller, and Susan Miller. Owned one enslaved person in 1860. Farm laborer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps District, p. 129.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps District, p. 129.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 6, p. 41.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Marriages, Nelson County, 1835.
